generic._info: Allows replacements for parameter-values within the post body (of any API-Call anywhere).  All breaklines in json-strings are currently removed, rather than parsed.  (Known issue)
Allows replacements for parameter-values within the post body (of any API-Call in the client).  All breaklines in json-strings are currently removed, rather than parsed.  (Known issue)

UpdateUserData._info: NOT SUPPORTED... Allows replacements for parameter-values within the post body (of a specific API-Call: Client.UpdateUserData).  All breaklines in json-strings are currently removed, rather than parsed.  (Known issue)
